pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a small collection of tools for edk2 firmware images. They support decoding and printing the content of firmware volumes. Variable stores (OVMF_VARS.fd) can be modified, for example to enroll secure boot certificates.

use.flag: Completely disables checking for sys-boot/shim in your EFI; useful when you want to use sys-kernel/installkernel with the efistub USE flag.
